alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Palo Alto; Pocahontas; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Heavy Rainfall from Thunderstorms will Impact Portions of Pocahontas, northeastern Sac, Northwestern Calhoun and Southwestern Palo Alto Counties through 715 PM CDT... Heavy rainfall from these storms may produce localized areas of flooding. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall and localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Pocahontas, northeastern Sac, northwestern Calhoun and southwestern Palo Alto Counties, including the following locations... Palmer, Mallard, Pocahontas Municipal Airport, Varina, Pomeroy, Plover, Fonda and Havelock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Iowa.
